title: For Sale :1910 T206 Johnny Evers Portrait (Piedmont)
author: svtPONY95

posts.post_title: For Sale :1910 T206 Johnny Evers Portrait (Piedmont)
posts.post_content:
This is a very attractive and I believe under graded card with no creases , surface wrinkles or paper loss.  **** Sold ****

First to PM with Paypal gets it !!

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/svtPONY95/pre-war/17989/1910-t206-johnny-evers-portrait-piedmont[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/svtPONY95/pre-war-backs/25586/1910-t206-johnny-evers-portrait-piedmont[/IMG]

While this is already at the top:

Guy, please stop bumping your thread to the top when you sell the card.  Once you sell the card, your thread is useless right?  So why bring a useless thread to the top of the page?  It just clutters things up and is not very courteous to the guy right below you who just posted a new thread (that actually has cards for sale in it).  Obviously this is not directed at Doug specifically.  A lot of people do it.  End of rant.
